posts.text: For an awareness drive to protect from fraud, I am sharing one recent interaction. For my daughter I posted one advertisement regarding online teacher. One lady ( INDRANI MUKHERJEE) approached me in Facebook messenger that she provides online tution. Even after certain months of bearing her with a hope that she can do better in helping my daughter but finally she cheated me by taking advance for tution and blocked all contacts to connect her. She informed that she was connected to Physics Wallah Vidyapeeth Coaching Center Durgapur , and hence I trusted her. Requesting all premier educational coaching centres to avoid recruiting teachers with integrity issues as it will seriously impact the real vision of education. It’s my fault to trust her , so it’s an awareness drive from my end to protect yourself from such frauds. hashtag #fraud hashtag #durgapur hashtag #cheating hashtag #awareness hashtag #onlinetution hashtag #PhysicsWallah

Cluely Looks DEAD Chungin Lee Your product is not worth it anymore. Go check Redit Subs , I even tried it on my Mac pro M4 chip on Safari. I even tried it on whatsapp screen sharing , and none of the places were able to hide cluely in the SS. And you still use big words like "Changing the defination of word 'cheating' ". I mean really bruuh ? Why are you guyz just creating and surviving on a hype scam ? -- Cluely Thanks to Ananya Mishra to help me investigate. hashtag #scam hashtag #cluely hashtag #cheating hashtag #interview hashtag #interviews
Ola Electric this is so sad to see, this is people's hard earned money. Bhavish Aggarwal pls help all these customers who have trusted in your brand

Cheating leaves behind a lot of heartbreak and sadness, so why would a woman cheat on her partner? 💫 She’s dissatisfied with the relationship. 💫 There’s a lot of conflict within the relationship. 💫 She’s bored in the relationship. 💫 She wants more sexually. 💫 She feels neglected. 💫 She has an insecure attachment style. 💫 There’s a lack of communication in the relationship. 💫 She’s dealing with other mental health issues. 💫 She’s cheated before. Characteristics of Cheating Women 🪴 Low self-esteem 🪴 Dishonesty a trait 🪴 Lack of empathy 🪴 Low conscientiousness/ sense of responsibility 🪴 Impulsivity, they oftentimes don’t think through their decisions 🪴 Narcissistic behaviors hashtag #cheating hashtag #heartbreaks hashtag #women hashtag #cheat hashtag #life hashtag #love hashtag #people

So a CEO gets caught cheating at a Coldplay concert, and the internet loses its mind. Of course. Because nothing excites us more than someone else’s downfall. But why is romantic cheating the only kind we are obsessed with? Cheating isn’t just about affairs...it’s a lifestyle choice! - You take credit for a coworker’s idea? Cheating. - You fake a smile while secretly hating someone? Cheating. - You use “connections” or better known in India as JUGAAD...to skip the line? Cheating. - You lie to yourself with “I will start tomorrow”? Cheating. - You borrow money and make the lender feel illegal for asking for their own money back? Cheating. We love pointing fingers at scandals but ignore the tiny betrayals we commit daily. Maybe fix that first. hashtag #cheating hashtag #choice hashtag #gossip
